articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text commentary of Great Britain's Davis Cup quarter-final against Serbia in Malaga.
articles.title: Davis Cup: Serbia v Great Britain - watch and text

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Chelsea take on Paris FC in the Women's Champions League group stage at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Women's Champions League: Bright out as Chelsea host Paris FC

articles.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton denies claims by Christian Horner he approached Red Bull about a move there earlier this year.
articles.title: Hamilton denies Horner's Red Bull approach claims

articles.description: England Test captain Ben Stokes makes himself unavailable for the 2024 Indian Premier League to manage his workload and fitness.
articles.title: Stokes skips 2024 IPL to manage fitness and workload

articles.description: Katie Taylor promises a "completely different fight" against Chantelle Cameron in their rematch on Saturday.
articles.title: Underdog Taylor vows to grasp 'second chance'

articles.description: Matthew Potts replaces seamer Josh Tongue in England's squad for the one-day international series against West Indies in December.
articles.title: Potts replaces Tongue in England ODI squad

articles.description: Wales will face Finland in a Euro 2024 play-off semi-final on 21 March in Cardiff and will also be at home if they reach the play-off final.
articles.title: Wales host Finland in Euro 2024 play-off semis

articles.description: As the United States celebrates Thanksgiving BBC Sport takes a look back at some of the best Premier League goals by Americans.
articles.title: Watch best goals by Americans in the Premier League

articles.description: India beat Australia from the last ball of the game in the first of five T20s, four days after the World Cup final.
articles.title: India edge past Australia in last-ball T20 thriller

articles.description: An FA Council member who wrote on social media that "Adolf Hitler would be proud of Benjamin Netanyahu" resigns.
articles.title: Haq quits FA Council after Hitler-Netanyahu post
